snippet.title: Lithium City - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Available now for PC.
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1210610

Lithium City is a stylized isometric action game set in a neon-drenched world of electricity and violence. Fight, shoot, and dash your way through carefully hand-crafted levels as you ascend higher and higher up the towering skyscrapers.
